ThingDef.label: astartes bolter
ThingDef.description:
In the Warhammer 40,000 universe, the Astartes Bolter, also known as a Bolter, is the iconic and standard-issue firearm utilized by the Space Marines, revered for its lethal firepower and versatility on the battlefield.

The Bolter operates as a rapid-firing, self-loading, and magazine-fed weapon, firing mass-reactive bolts or projectiles. These bolts are explosive in nature, capable of causing significant damage upon impact, and are effective against a wide range of targets, from infantry to armored adversaries.

It serves as a hybrid weapon, bridging the gap between conventional firearms and small-scale artillery. The Bolter's deadly accuracy, powerful impact, and high firing rate make it a fearsome weapon capable of delivering devastating salvos while maintaining precision at moderate ranges.

Wielded by the Space Marines, the Astartes Bolter symbolizes the unparalleled might and advanced technology of the Imperium of Man, serving as an integral part of their arsenal in their eternal struggle against the myriad threats and adversaries in the grim and war-torn galaxy of Warhammer 40,000.

ThingDef.label: Executor bolt rifle
ThingDef.description:
In the Warhammer 40,000 universe, the Bolt Rifle is a standard-issue firearm used by various factions, including the Adeptus Astartes (Space Marines). It represents a versatile and lethal weapon known for its power and reliability on the battlefield.

The Bolt Rifle operates as a self-loading, magazine-fed firearm that fires mass-reactive bolts or projectiles. These bolts are designed to explode upon impact, causing substantial damage to targets. The weapon's design incorporates both rapid-fire capability and accuracy, making it effective against various adversaries, from infantry to armored units.

It serves as a primary weapon for Space Marine Primaris Intercessors and other similar units, embodying a balance between assault rifle functionality and heavy firepower. The Bolt Rifle's precision and destructive potential make it a formidable choice in engagements across different ranges, showcasing the technological prowess and combat superiority of the Adeptus Astartes.

Wielded by the Space Marines, the Bolt Rifle stands as a symbol of their relentless might and technological advancement, serving as a crucial tool in their ceaseless battles against the enemies of the Imperium in the grim and war-ravaged galaxy of Warhammer 40,000.

ThingDef.label: Executor heavy bolter
ThingDef.description:
In the Warhammer 40,000 universe, the Heavy Bolter is a powerful and devastating support weapon widely utilized by various factions, including the Adeptus Astartes (Space Marines) and Imperial Guard, renowned for its incredible rate of fire and significant firepower.

The Heavy Bolter operates as a heavy-caliber machine gun, firing large mass-reactive bolts at an incredibly high speed. These bolts possess immense kinetic energy and explode upon impact, capable of tearing through infantry, lightly armored vehicles, and fortifications with ease.

It is usually mounted on vehicles, fortifications, or wielded by specialized infantry units. Its sustained and suppressive fire provides excellent anti-infantry and anti-vehicle capabilities, serving as a crucial asset in defensive positions or laying down extensive covering fire on the battlefield.

The Heavy Bolter's combination of high rate of fire, substantial stopping power, and versatility make it a fearsome weapon, instilling fear in enemies and showcasing the overwhelming firepower wielded by the Imperium in their relentless fight against the myriad threats in the grim darkness of the Warhammer 40,000 universe.

ThingDef.label: astartes pattern shotgun
ThingDef.description:
In the Warhammer 40,000 universe, the Astartes Shotgun is a specialized firearm occasionally utilized by certain factions like the Adeptus Astartes (Space Marines) or other forces within the Imperium of Man.

The Astartes Shotgun is a close-range, scatter-based weapon that fires a spread of high-impact projectiles, typically in a cone-shaped pattern. These pellets are designed to cause significant damage at close quarters, making the shotgun particularly effective in tight spaces or during close combat engagements.

While not as versatile or accurate at longer ranges as some other firearms, the Astartes Shotgun compensates with its ability to deliver devastating firepower in close-quarters scenarios, capable of shredding through lightly-armored targets or clearing enemy infantry at close range.

Used by certain specialized Space Marine units or Imperial forces, the Astartes Shotgun represents a brutal and efficient close-combat option within the arsenal of the Imperium of Man, allowing its wielders to unleash devastating salvos amidst the grim and unending conflicts of the Warhammer 40,000 universe.

ThingDef.label: ultra pattern sniper rifle
ThingDef.description:
In the Warhammer 40,000 universe, the Astartes Sniper Rifle is a specialized long-range firearm used by the Adeptus Astartes (Space Marines), specifically by their dedicated marksmen and scouts.

The Astartes Sniper Rifle embodies precision and lethality, designed for accuracy and reliability in targeting enemies at long distances. It operates as a high-caliber, single-shot weapon equipped with an advanced scope or targeting systems to enhance accuracy and facilitate precise aiming.

The ammunition used by Astartes Sniper Rifles is specially crafted to penetrate armor and inflict devastating damage, making it highly effective against high-value or heavily armored targets. These rifles are primarily employed for targeted eliminations, disrupting enemy leadership, or engaging threats from a concealed and advantageous position.

Wielded by Space Marine scouts and specialized marksmen, the Astartes Sniper Rifle is a testament to the Adeptus Astartes' strategic precision and their ability to eliminate key adversaries with surgical precision, showcasing the lethal prowess of these elite warriors within the grim and relentless conflicts of the Warhammer 40,000 universe.

ThingDef.label: heavy bolt pistol
ThingDef.description:
In the Warhammer 40,000 universe, the Heavy Bolt Pistol is a robust sidearm known for its increased firepower compared to standard bolt pistols, delivering devastating shots at close to moderate ranges.

This pistol variant is designed to provide a higher caliber of ammunition, delivering larger mass-reactive bolts compared to the standard bolt pistol. These heavier bolts cause more significant impact and damage upon hitting the target, making the Heavy Bolt Pistol effective against various adversaries, from infantry to lightly armored foes.

Wielded by certain elite units or individuals requiring additional firepower in close-quarter engagements, the Heavy Bolt Pistol balances portability with increased stopping power. It serves as a versatile secondary armament, providing users with enhanced offensive capabilities when facing formidable opponents or in scenarios demanding rapid and powerful shots.

The Heavy Bolt Pistol showcases the Imperium's dedication to providing adaptable and potent weaponry to its forces, representing a blend of reliability, power, and versatility within the grim and war-torn setting of Warhammer 40,000.
